video.title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
video.synopsis: When a young laborer escapes to the world aboveground, he discovers a violent land in which humans battle robots controlled by a power-hungry noble.

episodes.synopsis: Kamina and Simon live in the underground town of Giha, where a giant Gunman crashes through their home. Can they defeat this giant intruder?
episodes.title: Bust Through The Heavens With Your Drill

episodes.synopsis: Kamina and Simon must defend against a new Gunmen threat. Kamina manages to get control of his own Gunman to fight the Beastmen who are on the attack.
episodes.title: I Said I'm Gonna Pilot That Thing

episodes.synopsis: To stop Viral, a formidable Beastman, and his powerful Gunman, the Gurren and the Lagann combine to form an all new Gunman -- the Gurren-Lagann.
episodes.title: You Two-Faced Son of A Bitch

episodes.synopsis: Team Gurren leaves Littner Village to strike a possible Gunmen rallying point, only to fight the Black Siblings -- and their own hungry stomachs.
episodes.title: Does Having So Many Faces Make You Great?

episodes.synopsis: Team Gurren end up in an underground village where the citizens all worship the Gunmen as divine beings, and everyone has to live a humble existence.
episodes.title: I Don't Understand It At All

episodes.synopsis: With new members added to their crew, Team Gurren continue heading toward the Gunmen rallying point, only to get sidetracked at a hot springs resort.
episodes.title: Sit in the Hot Tub 'Till You're Sick

episodes.synopsis: One of the Four Divine Generals of the Spiral King arrives with a giant Gunmen fortress. Can Kamina and Simon pilot the Gurren-Lagann to victory?
episodes.title: You'll Be The One To Do That

episodes.synopsis: Team Gurren and their new allies team up to form Team Dai-Gurren and launch a strike against the Gunmen, only to lose one of their own in the attack.
episodes.title: Farewell Comrades

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren take control of the enemy fortress. Simon notices a Gunman throw a capsule into a valley, and discovers a young human girl named Nia.
episodes.title: Just What Is Exactly Human?

episodes.synopsis: Adiane spares killing Team Dai-Gurren. Nia gives Simon advice that bothers Yoko. The team assembles when Adiane returns to finish the job she started.
episodes.title: Who Really Was Your Big Brother?

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren are taken captive underground by Guame. Simon understands what Kamina's last words meant. Nia discovers why she was thrown away.
episodes.title: Simon, Please Remove Your Hand

episodes.synopsis: The team gets some much needed play time on the beach while waiting for modifications to the Dai-Gurren. Only Adiane and Viral are planning to attack.
episodes.title: Miss Yoko, I Have Something to Ask You

episodes.synopsis: Nia decides to cook for the crew. The fourth member of the Divine Generals attacks, and it's up to Simon and Yoko to launch a counter-assault.
episodes.title: Everybody, Eat to Your Hearts Content

episodes.synopsis: The team arrives at the outskirts of Teppelin, but before heading to the city, they must face a combined assault by Cytomander and Guame's forces.
episodes.title: How Are You, Everyone?

episodes.synopsis: As the city of Teppelin collapses, Simon and Nia must fight the largest Gunman they've ever faced before they confront Nia's father, the Spiral King.
episodes.title: I'll Head Towards Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: This episode recaps the events that happened in episodes 1 through 15, including the battles won and lives lost for the resilient Team Dai-Gurren.
episodes.title: Entire Polysynthesis

episodes.synopsis: When the danger mentioned in Lordgenome's last words reveals itself, Simon, the new leader in a prosperous civilization, must confront the threat.
episodes.title: You Understand Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Simon searches for Nia after her astonishing announcement and the Anti-Spirals' first attack. Meanwhile, Rossiu completes his secret project.
episodes.title: I'll Make You Tell the Truth of the World

episodes.synopsis: Rossiu overthrows Simon and has him arrested. When the Anti-Spirals launch an attack, Rossiu must let Simon use the Gurren-Lagann to defend the city.
episodes.title: We Shall Survive by Any Means Necessary

episodes.synopsis: Simon meet Viral in prison, who comments on how far Simon has fallen because of recent events. Rossiu's emergency plan is finally revealed.
episodes.title: Oh, God, How Far Will You Test Us?

episodes.synopsis: Yoko leaves her job as a schoolteacher to break Simon out of prison. Simon is reunited with Team Dai-Gurren and sets out to protect the Arc-Gurren.
episodes.title: You Must Survive

episodes.synopsis: There's only one way to stop the Human Annihilation System: The Gurren-Lagann and the Arc-Gurren must combine to form the Arc-Gurren-Lagann.
episodes.title: This Is My Last Duty

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren begin to make preparations for the war against the Anti-Spirals. Kinon and Simon desperately search for Rossiu, who has gone missing.
episodes.title: Let's Go, The Final Battle

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren finally reach the Anti-Spirals' homeworld. But it's a trap, and lives are lost when they fall prey to the enemy's explosive attack.
episodes.title: We Will Never Forget, This Minute and This Second

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren can't escape the ocean of despair created by the Anti-Spirals -- until a member of the team sacrifices himself to save everyone else.
episodes.title: I Accept Your Dying Wish

episodes.synopsis: After transforming their flagship into the Super Galactic Gurren-Lagann, the crew finally fight back against the enemy, until Kamina suddenly appears.
episodes.title: Let's Go, Comrades

episodes.synopsis: Team Dai-Gurren forms Tengen Toppa Gurren-Lagann before their final battle against the deadly Anti-Spirals to determine the fate of the universe.
episodes.title: All the Lights in the Sky Are Stars
